SUCCESS_HIGH_JOY_GENERAL.text: Fantastic job! Your positive energy is contagious!
Wow, you're on a roll! Keep up the amazing work!

SUCCESS_NEUTRAL_GENERAL.text: Good work. Your efforts are paying off.

FAILURE_LOW_SADNESS_GENERAL.text: It's okay, setbacks happen. Take a moment and try again when you're ready.
Don't be discouraged. Every attempt is a step forward.

NEW_USER_NEUTRAL_WELCOME.text: Welcome! We're excited to have you here. Explore and have fun!

NEUTRAL_NEUTRAL_GENERAL.text: Thanks for sharing. How can I help you further?

SUCCESS_HIGH_JOY_GENERAL.text: 정말 대단해요! 당신의 긍정적인 에너지가 넘쳐요!
와, 상승세네요! 계속해서 멋진 모습 보여주세요!

SUCCESS_NEUTRAL_GENERAL.text: 잘 하셨습니다. 노력이 결실을 맺고 있네요.

FAILURE_LOW_SADNESS_GENERAL.text: 괜찮아요, 실패는 있을 수 있어요. 잠시 쉬었다가 준비되면 다시 도전해 보세요.
낙담하지 마세요. 모든 시도가 한 걸음 나아가는 과정이에요.

NEW_USER_NEUTRAL_WELCOME.text: 환영합니다! 함께하게 되어 기쁩니다. 즐겁게 둘러보세요!
